intro: Here is a small sampling of the web development work I've done over the past few years. Due to the confidential nature of some client work, all names, logos, branding, fonts, and images have been changed. In many cases, the parts of the code I worked on have been extracted from their original pages and/or software framework for the purpose of hosting them here. Many of these projects were a collaborative effort with other developers, so in some cases I cannot claim 100% responsibility. If you have questions or concerns about any of the work found here, please contact me.

works.subtitle: Vue.js with Routing, Bootstrap, and Webpack
works.description: Formula One driver, team, and race data application built with Vue.js v2.4, Webpack v2.2, Bootstrap v3.2, and APIs from Ergast.com.

works.subtitle: Interactive 7-Step JS Quiz
works.description: Multi-step quiz widget with interactive controls and real scoring. Originally built as an Adobe AEM component for a financial client.

works.subtitle: Accessible Custom Select Dropdown JS Plugin
works.description: Fully-accessible, custom JavaScript select menu plugin. Demo page shows different features and uses. Originally built for a retail brand.

works.subtitle: Flexbox Main Navigation with Superhero Parallax Scroll
works.description: Main navigation built with flexbox CSS and Bootstrap. Above the nav is a superhero promo with parallax scrolling. Originally built for a retail brand.

works.subtitle: Parallax Promo Page with YouTube API Integration
works.description: Single-page product promo with parallax scrolling and YouTube API integration. Originally built with Node, Harp, and Jade for an electronics brand's social media campaign.

works.subtitle: Multi-page Account Management Design Prototype
works.description: Static data design prototype for a retirement account management site. Originally built with Handlebars, Grunt, Assemble, and Sass for a financial client.

works.subtitle: AngularJS v.1.3 App with Ajax Data
works.description: Multi-page Angular app that retrives Formula 1 racing data from the Ergast API. Has a few bugs and is unfinished.
